'''Cup O' Grainfruit''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Cup O’ Grainfruit is obtainable from [[Chanca]] at [[Zakan's Street Bites]] for 1,250 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Cup O' Grainfruit restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP and an additional '''800'''/'''1,000'''/'''1,200''' HP to the selected character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
